name: Sabina, 24
description: Who wants to learn how frog talks?
bio: Hi, I'm Sabina! I'm passionate about languages and especially interested in Japanese culture.  Let's chat about frogs and Japanese writing!

name: Lukas, 23
bio: Hey there, I'm Lukas. Stones are fascinating! I love geology and exploring nature.  Planning a trip to France soon to see some cool rocks.  Anyone want to teach me French?
